Package org.vast.swe

Class DataOutputStreamBI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.io.DataOutputStream
          • org.vast.swe.DataOutputStreamBI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, DataOutputExt
    public class DataOutputStreamBI
extends java.io.DataOutputStream
implements DataOutputExt

    Extension of DataOutputStream to support writing unsigned int and long values as well as ASCII (0 terminated) strings as byte sequence. This is for big endian order (i.e. Most Significant Byte first)

    Since:
    Feb 10, 2006

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void writeASCII​(java.lang.String s)
      Writes a 0 terminated ASCII string to stream
      void writeUnsignedByte​(short v)
      Writes the lowest significant byte of the given short value as an unsigned byte
      void writeUnsignedInt​(long v)
      Writes the 4 lowest significant bytes of the given long value as an unsigned int
      void writeUnsignedLong​(long v)
      Writes long value as unsigned.
      void writeUnsignedShort​(int v)
      Writes the 2 lowest significant bytes of the given int value as an unsigned short
